definitions.definition: A large round stone used for grinding grain .
A coarse - grained sandstone used for making such stones; millstone grit .
Ellipsis of millstone round one's neck , a heavy responsibility that is difficult to bear (referring to Matthew 18:6 in the Bible ) .
examples: Paying the mortgage every month is a millstone round their necks.

main_definition: A large round stone used for grinding grain .
secondary_definitions: ( geology ) A coarse - grained sandstone used for making such stones; millstone grit .
( figurative ) Ellipsis of millstone round one's neck , a heavy responsibility that is difficult to bear (referring to Matthew 18:6 in the Bible ) .
